Vinted Copilot: Your Ultimate Shopping Assistant for Vinted! 🛍️ 

Where Vinted is available, so is your vinted copilot.

🚀 UPDATE :

💸 Affiliate program : Your audience uses your promotional code ONE time when buying tokens, and, you earn 35% recurring commission for every purchase for LIFE !

--------------------
⭐️ Key Features:

👚 Advanced Brand Filtering: Hide unwanted brands like Shein, Amazon, Zara effortlessly. Simply search for brand names, select them, and apply the filter.  

🌍  Country-Based Filtering:  Shop local or from specific countries only. Select your preferred country, and your feed will display items from that region. Vinted Filter by Location/Country.

🔄  Automatic Filters:  Enable automatic filtering to apply your settings on every page as you browse.  

⭐ Favourites Management:   
- Organize your favourites into custom folders for easy access.  
- Automatically sync your favourites with the extension.  
- Remove sold or unwanted items with one sync-click.  
- Quickly open product pages directly from the extension.  

🔔 Easy Navigation:   
- Access your custom filters and features directly from the popup menu.

💸 No subscription plan, pay only when you use the extension 💁‍♀️

---

Why Vinted Copilot?   
I built that extension based on the main difficulties encountered by Vinted users.

🚀 One goal with Vinted Copilot :

Take the hassle out of shopping by streamlining your browsing and favourites management.

Whether you’re looking for something specific or just want to avoid certain brands, this extension has you covered.
